scripts.test: npm run build:test && node --test $(find dist/tests -name '*.test.js' -not -path '*/smartContracts.test.js' | tr '\n' ' ')
scripts.test:quick: npm run build:test && node --test $(find dist/tests -name '*.test.js' -not -path '*/smartContracts.test.js' | tr '\n' ' ') --test-timeout 300000
